amendment.description: Amendments modify the grant expenditure provisions to include eligibility grants for the research and identification of medicinal uses of tropical forest flora and fauna to treat human diseases and illnesses; and require consultation with indigenous leaders by the Enterprise for the Americas Board with respect to a tropical forest fund in the beneficiary country and region as appropriate.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of amendments numbered 2 and 3 as printed in the Congressional Record and offered en bloc.

action.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendments (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 335 - 79 (Roll No. 62).
